mapper.select: select ask_idx, user_idx, ask_title, ask_contents, ask_date, ask_answer, ask_answer_date from ask where user_idx = #{userIdx} and ask_delete = "N" order by ask_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into ask (user_idx, ask_title, ask_contents, ask_date) values (#{userIdx}, #{askTitle}, #{askContents}, #{askDate})
mapper.update: update ask set ask_title=#{askTitle}, ask_contents=#{askContents} where ask_idx = #{askIdx} and user_idx = #{userIdx}
update ask set ask_delete = "Y" where ask_idx = #{askIdx} and user_idx = #{userIdx}
